Class TextAnalyzerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextAnalyzerMain

  • public class TextAnalyzerMain
extends java.lang.Object
    TODO : Cleanup main!! VigenereMain is a terminal program to encrypt and decrypt textfiles with the Vigenere-Cipher. It informs the user automatically when started with wrong arguments or missing external resources. Unexpected side actions (like overwrideing existing files) are handled with a confirmation dialog. The Vigenre-Cipher is extended with a self-thought algorithm to extend the keyword to the length of the text. More information about the Cigenere-Cipher: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vigen%C3%A8re_cipher

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The entrypoint of VigenereMain. Checks if all arguments are set and starts the actual process. Handles eventual Exceptions of invalid user input.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments from the user input

      • loadFileIntoAnalyzer

        private static boolean loadFileIntoAnalyzer(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads a file with FileController and instantiates a new TextAnalyzer with this file. When everything was successfull it returns true, otherwise false. The file handling completely delegated to the class FileController as method openFile.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the file to load into the TextAnalyzer.
        Returns:
        Boolean true or false if successfull or not.

      • loadFileIntoAnalyzer

        private static void loadFileIntoAnalyzer()
        Reads filename from user input and reads afterward the file with the given filename into the analyzer.

      • actionHandle

        private static void actionHandle()
        Prints the user menu to the console prompts the user to chose an action, validates the input and starts the action. When there is an invalid user input it prints an error and the user has to reenter. When the action is handled the menu gets printed again until the action "13" is chosen.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.security.AccessControlException

      • sortAndPrintAsc

        private static void sortAndPrintAsc()
        Sorts the wordlist ascending by key (words) and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintAscByValue

        private static void sortAndPrintAscByValue()
        Sorts the wordlist ascending by value (word count) and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintAscInterval

        private static void sortAndPrintAscInterval()
        Promts the user to input an interval, sorts the wordlist ascending by key (words), filters the worldlist with the interval and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintAscIntervalByValue

        private static void sortAndPrintAscIntervalByValue()
        Promts the user to input an interval, sorts the wordlist ascending by value (word count), filters the worldlist with the interval and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintDesc

        private static void sortAndPrintDesc()
        Sorts the wordlist descending by keys (words) and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintDescByValue

        private static void sortAndPrintDescByValue()
        Sorts the wordlist descending by values (word count) and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintDescInterval

        private static void sortAndPrintDescInterval()
        Promts the user to input an interval, sorts the wordlist descending by Key, filters the worldlist with the interval and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrintDescIntervalByValue

        private static void sortAndPrintDescIntervalByValue()
        Promts the user to input an interval, sorts the wordlist descending by Value, filters the worldlist with the interval and prints the wordlist to the console.

      • sortAndPrint

        private static void sortAndPrint(boolean byKey,
                boolean asc,
                boolean interval)
        Sorts the wordlist according the parameters and prints it to the console. When interval is set, it promts the user to input the min and max bound of the interval. When is given the wordlist gets also filtered the words occurence, in between the the interval.
        Parameters:
        byKey - Sort by key or value. key = words, value = wordcount.
        asc - Sort direction true = asc, false = desc.
        interval - Filtered interval or not.

      • printWordCount

        private static void printWordCount()
        Prints the total word count of the current Wordlist to the console.

      • showFile

        private static void showFile()
        Reads a filename from the console, reads the file according the filename and prints its content to the console. If the file is not available, an error gets printet to the console.

      • writeWordList

        private static void writeWordList()
        Prints the actual wordlist line by line to the terminal. Format: "word1 1\n"

      • printWordList

        private static void printWordList(java.util.HashMap wordMap)
        Prints the wordlist to the console.
        Parameters:
        wordMap - Wordlist as a HashMap.

      • printActions

        private static void printActions()
        Prints the action menu with short action descriptions to the console.

      • validateArgumentLength

        private static void validateArgumentLength(java.lang.String[] args)

        Parameters:
        args - Argument array from the user input.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
